attributes.action: Challenge to anyone to live on £53 per week
attributes.additional_details:
MP's and former MP's state that they can live on £53 per week.  They are not taking into account the cost of food, gas, electricity, mortgage/rent, council tax, water rates, insurances and TV licence to name but a few.

We would like the people say that they could live on this amount to try and see if they could manage.
